name: Nextered
description:
Nextered: Make barriers to destroy the enemy field

- WASD or arrow keys to move
- Move on the map to create barriers to destroy parts of the map
- Level is won when 85% of more is destroyed
- Score is calculated from the map destruction percentage and the time it took

Made in less than a week for Anything Goes Jam [8 Bits to Infinity] using the limitations The player cannot use weapons and The player character cannot walk. Made in Unity 2019.1.9f1, Bfxr 1.4.1 for sounds.

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

Contains fonts ©2014 Emmeran RICHARD (www.emmeranrichard.fr) and ©2018 The ZCOOL QingKe HuangYou Project Authors (https://www.github.com/googlefonts/zcool-qingke-huangyou)

Contains assets (graphics and sounds) by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

Source code available on GitHub.
